overview: Every guy dreams of having a girl like in Secretaries 2 working for him. You'd never be stressed at the job again. Instead of her getting coffee, she'd be giving head. Instead of her taking calls and messages, she'd be taking it up the ass over the desk!  Everyone would want to work in an office building like this one, but this one is definitely a pipe dream, so you'll have to settle for Secretaries 2!
title: Secretaries 2
